sprykerComponent.name: select
sprykerComponent.readme:
select (atom)

Creates a simple, single-selection drop-down element.

Code sample

{% include atom('select') with {
    data: {
        options: options
    },
    attributes: {
        name: 'name',
        disabled: false
    }
} only %}

sass.description: This mixin defines the basic style for select
Makes the element 100% wide, filling the container
Highlights the element with red border, remarking the presence of an error in the selection
